sections.title: Basics of Python
sections.description: In this section, I learned the fundamentals of Python, including variables, data types, loops, and functions. These concepts are essential for writing clean and efficient code, which is critical for implementing AI algorithms.
takeaways: Learned how to write reusable functions.

sections.title: Strings
sections.description: In this section, I explored string manipulation techniques, including slicing, formatting, and built-in string methods. Understanding strings is crucial for working with text data in AI applications.
takeaways: Learned how to manipulate strings effectively.
Understood the importance of string formatting in AI workflows.
